description.en: BTCMoon is a tokenized version of Bitcoin on the Ethereum blockchain. BTCMoon will have faster transaction speeds than Bitcoin. The average block time on Bitcoin is 8 minutes, while on Ethereum it's 24 seconds. The average Bitcoin transaction fee typically ranges from $2 to $5, while Ethereum fees typically range from $0.20 to $0.50. BTCMoon can work with smart contracts on the Ethereum blockchain.
